topic.title: Manage projects
topic.p: To create a new project, on the Projects page click the New project button.
After creating a new project, you can rename or delete it. To be able to associate your code to the project, click the Generate token button and copy the token.

topic.p: You can also add a project to a project group by clicking the Add to group button.
